jobTitle.description: The title of the job for which the candidate is being screened; must be a string and is required

candidateName.description: The name of the candidate being screened; must be a string and is required

skillsMatch.description: Details about the candidate's skill match with the job requirements

summary.description: A summary of how well the candidate's skills match the job; must be a string and is required

degreeOfMatch.description: A percentage representing the degree of match between the candidate's skills and the job requirements; must be an integer and is required

exceedsRequirements.description: Details about how the candidate exceeds job requirements

summary.description: A summary of how the candidate exceeds the job requirements; must be a string and is required

lackingSkills.description: Details about the skills the candidate is lacking for the job

summary.description: A summary of the skills the candidate is lacking; must be a string and is required

experienceAlignment.description: Details about how the candidate's experience aligns with the job requirements

summary.description: A summary of how the candidate's experience aligns with the job; must be a string and is required

overallSummary.description: An overall summary of the screening report, including score and improvement points

summary.description: A summary of the overall assessment; must be a string and is required

score.description: The overall score for the candidate's suitability; must be an integer and is required

pointsForImprovement.description: A list of areas where the candidate can improve; must be an array of strings and is required

interviewQuestions.description: Suggested interview questions based on the screening

skillsBasedQuestions.description: 10 questions based on the candidate's skills; must be an array of strings and is required

strengthBasedQuestions.description: List of 10 questions based on the candidate's strengths; must be an array of strings and is required

gapExplorationQuestions.description: List of 10 questions aimed at exploring gaps in the candidate's profile; must be an array of strings and is required
